name: Fishing With Dad (tobble) (tobble)
description:
[THIS IS A SPOOKY SCARY GAME]

while out fishing with your dad, you get attacked and unfortunately, he gets split up into pieces and spread across the lake! it's your job to go find his parts and bring him back together! But don't forget to have fun while doing it

to catch fish, just cast your line far out in front of their face so they don't get scared by it. 

Controls

WASD - move

M - map

ESC - pause

LEFT CLICK - cast rod/reel in

ENTER - select menu item

Features
  •  fully explorable "open" world!
  •  tons of fishing fun!
  •  6 dad pieces to collect!
  •  3 monster fish to avoid!

watch the development of the game at https://www.youtube.com/@tobycollier

sfx provided by https://www.zapsplat.com

models provided by https://elbolilloduro.itch.io/
